name: DentalMarketingUniversityGrowthStrategies
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Dental Marketing University Growth Strategies is hosted by Founder Dr. Ken Newhouse. Each episode contains advanced training on online marketing & funnels, automation, persuasive communication and sales training for Dentists and Dental specialists. 

Each show contains a high-level growth strategy from Newhouse, or from one of the many world-renowned experts he frequently has as guests. Dental Marketing University Growth Strategies consistently delivers fresh, high-level content so you can find, attract and convert the highest-quality prospects into paying new patients ... Generate more referrals and become more profitable than ever.

If you want to grow your practice and brand; create a bigger online presence; consistently attract new patients and make more money … you’re absolutely gonna "Growth Strategies" from Dental Marketing University. 

You’ll also learn the most-advanced sales methodologies available as Ken teaches you how to active your prospect's and client's Genetic Buying Triggers and Genetic Buying Responses using his Sales Control™ system.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
